name: Planet Bakery
description:
Planet Bakery

The game to make alien dounts! Yes you hear right making awsome alien donuts, with the most hight tech instruments like the Alien Oven (patent pending) 4000, the Alien Mixer 5000 (patent pending) or the Alien Donut Packer 3000 (patent pending).

Select your alien color.

Make and Sell as much Alien Donuts as you can!

Share your highscore. (Future update)

Create more than 20 varieties of Alien Donuts!

Only in Planet Bakery.

Aproved as the best Alien Donut Baking Game by the Alien Donut Baking Games Council.
